summary: This document is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting a revised draft and a redline version of a motion to quash. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Motion to Quash Draft Revision
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney circulates a revised draft and a redline comparison of a motion to quash.

locations.context: Office of the Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of New York

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Federal judicial district handling the case

keyFacts: A motion to quash was being drafted and revised in November 2021 as part of the Epstein case proceedings.
The communication originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email includes attachments showing a revision process (v2 to v3) of the legal motion.
